author: Special Correspondent
text:
They visit botanical garden, aquarium and take a toy train ride

Child patients of Jipmer's Regional Cancer Centre being imparted drawing lessons as part of International Childhood Cancer Day on Saturday— Photo: Special Arrangement

Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education & Research (Jipmer)’s oncology unit organised a fun trip for child patients of its Regional Cancer Centre coinciding with International Childhood Cancer Day on Saturday.

Collaborative effort

The trip was conducted in collaboration with JIVDAYA, CANKIDS and ROTARACT Club of veterinary college. The Botanical Garden and Forest Department, a toy train ride, aquarium visit, and drawing lessons by artists from Puducherry were included in the day-long event in which about 50 children participated.
title: Fun trip for child patients
